creator: apache@mathijs.info
text:
Created attachment 30945
Suggested patch for 2.2 docs

An errornous space exists in the href to SetEnvIf in the documentation for SetEnv:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_env.html#setenv

This is also present in the 2.4 and trunk brances of the documentation.

Attached is a patch for the 2.2 branch, if needed ;)
This has been fixed in r1533748. Thanks for the report!
creator: DRuggeri@primary.net
